Detailed Description

Introduction

Overview

The USB Hid module provides a set of API’s that allow user Applications to integrate support for the USB HID Class. The USB hid module takes care of the communication between USB and the hid device. Hid Class module implements interrupt mode of transfer for sending and receiving data from the end points.

References

USB Specification Ver 2.0 Universal Serial Bus Device Class Definition for Hid Devices Ver 1.0
